scripts.deploy: source .env && forge clean && FOUNDRY_PROFILE="full_test" forge script script/deployment/DeployNewTargetContractSet.s.sol:DeployNewTargetContractSet --rpc-url $RPC_URL  --broadcast --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY
scripts.deploy:adapters: source .env && forge clean && FOUNDRY_PROFILE="full_test" forge script script/deployment/DeployFeedRegistryAdapter.s.sol:DeployFeedRegistryAdapter --rpc-url $RPC_URL  --broadcast --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY
scripts.lint: npm run lint:sol && npm run prettier:check
scripts.test:coverage:report: forge coverage --report lcov && genhtml lcov.info --branch-coverage --output-dir coverage
scripts.pre-push: git diff HEAD --ignore-submodules --quiet && FOUNDRY_PROFILE='full_test' forge test --ffi --force
